HEROES

  • {{hero.name}}
Select a Hero to Edit None {{hero}}
import { Component, OnDestroy, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {Hero} from '../app/Models/hero' import { Observable, Subscription } from 'rxjs'; import { Store } from '@ngrx/store'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit, OnDestroy { constructor( private store: Store<{heroList:{Heroes: Hero[]}}> ) {console.log("app comp init")} heroes: Observable<{Heroes: Hero[]}>; xero: { Heroes: Array}; yero: Hero[] = []; zer: any; sub: Subscription; updateChosen: boolean = true; selectedHero: string = ""; ngOnInit(): void { this.heroes = this.store.select('heroList') this.sub = this.store.select('heroList').subscribe( { next: (hero) => {console.log("incomning"),console.log(hero), this.xero = hero, this.yero = hero.Heroes, this.zer = hero }, error: err => console.log(err), complete: () => console.log("complete") } ) } getHeroes(): Hero[] { console.log(this.xero.Heroes) console.log("----") console.log(this.yero) console.log("----") console.log(this.zer) return this.xero.Heroes } alertm() { console.log("alert") } ngOnDestroy(): void { console.log("destroyed app component") } }
